long_description: The Thule XAdapt9 adapter lets you mount the Thule 517 Peloton, Thule 518 Echelon or Thule 516 Prologue bike carriers to your Thule Rapid Aero or Xsporter(TM) rack. 1 adapter set will convert 1 Thule Peloton, Echelon or Prologue (all sold separately) bike carrier.
short_description: The Thule XAdapt9 adapter lets you mount the Thule 517 Peloton, Thule 518 Echelon or Thule 516 Prologue bike carriers to your Thule Rapid Aero or Xsporter(TM) rack.
